name: OPZ
description: OPZ is a comprehensive ecosystem designed to revolutionize our interaction with digital assets. It includes the OPZ Wallet, an AI-powered and secure self-custodial solution powered by the KeyFusion protocol, a form of MPC (Multi-Party Computation). OPZ-AI goes beyond the basics, offering in-depth analysis of recent and long-term trends that combine the latest market news, technical data, and global insights. Staying ahead of the crypto market demands precise, real-time, actionable information and insights. OPZ-AI is your smart crypto analyst, offering a deep dive into the market with its AI-driven insights.
